meanings.sent1: She was outcoaching her opponent with clever strategies.
meanings.sent2: The coach was outcoaching the other team with his smart plays.
meanings.sent3: The young coach was outcoaching the experienced one, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: By outcoaching his rival, he proved himself as the best in the league.
meanings.sent5: Outcoaching requires both skill and dedication to succeed.

meanings.definition: The act of coaching better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: His outcoaching of the team led them to victory.
meanings.sent2: The outcoaching displayed by the coach was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The outcoaching at the championship game was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her outcoaching of the players was evident in their improved performance.
meanings.sent5: Outcoaching is a key aspect of being a successful coach.
